## defineContextMenuCommand() function

Allows to type check a context menu command definition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function defineContextMenuCommand<InteractionType extends ContextMenuInteractionType, AllowDMs extends boolean = true>(definition: ContextMenuCommandDefinition<InteractionType, AllowDMs>): ContextMenuCommandDefinition<InteractionType, AllowDMs>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  definition | [ContextMenuCommandDefinition](./noisecord.contextmenucommanddefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;InteractionType, AllowDMs&gt; |  |

**Returns:**

[ContextMenuCommandDefinition](./noisecord.contextmenucommanddefinition.md)<!-- -->&lt;InteractionType, AllowDMs&gt;

## Example


```
export default defineContextMenuCommand({
   key: "mycommand",

   type: ApplicationCommandType.Message,
   allowDMs: false,

   handler: async req => {
       // implementation of mycommand goes here
   }
});
```
